scripts.build: npm run install-client && npm run install-server && npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.deploy: npm run install-client && npm run install-server && npm run build-client && npm run build-server && npm run start
scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix client install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix client run build && npm --prefix server install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix server run build
